div.p: I come from a family of 6 children, unfortunately when I was 14 my oldest brother was killed in an accident, I used to live in Cumbria,
you know a normal sort of family way of being brought up, my mother and father worked hard all their lives and you can appreciate that money wasn’t
always there so we couldn’t have everything that we wanted but I would say that my childhood, apart from the school side of things,
was happy, it was happy because we went on holiday once a year, my parents did provide for us and you know to be honest with you
they were a fantastic mum and dad and they’re still alive today thank goodness, you know. They really instilled into myself and my sisters
to respect people so I really think it’s, you know, going back to my parents and everything you know I couldn’t ask for better role models
to be honest with you I really couldn’t.
